name: Roblox Custom Color Changer
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Before you hit install go to "Customize Settings"
2. Select the color you want from the color picker
3. hit "Install Theme"

This theme allows you to change the color of ROBLOX's website to any color you please.
additional_info: AT THIS MOMENT THIS THEME DOESNT WORK DUE TO NEW WHITE THEME, I WILL BE RE-WRITING THIS SOON ENOUGH (aka whenever i get to it)
